headline: Jim Cramer Discusses the Recent Stock Rally in RTX as the Company Aligns with Government Goals
summary: RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about, along with the memory shortage. headline: Data Link Solutions awarded $248M U.S. Navy contract
summary: The U.S. Navy has awarded Data Link Solutions, a joint venture between BAE Systems (BAESY) and Collins Aerospace, an RTX (RTX) business, a $248M production contract to deliver hundreds of Multifunctional Information Distribution System Joint Tactical Radio System terminals for U.S. forces and allies.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your por

headline: RTX price target raised to $230 from $220 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital raised the firm’s price target on RTX (RTX) to $230 from $220 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares after its “strong” Q4 earnings beat. Commercial sales drove the Q4 strength, but the outlook for defense sales will continue to be a focus for investors, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The GTF fleet management plan remains in-line with company expectations, and the firm believes the initial 2026 guidance supports positive sentiment, RBC added.Claim 50% Off TipRa

headline: RTX Defense Wins With Spain And Poland Underpin Valuation And Momentum
summary: RTX secured a $1.7b Patriot air and missile defense contract with Spain, adding to its international defense backlog. The company won a $380.8m Tomahawk missile modernization contract, focused on upgrading existing systems. RTX was selected to provide AI enabled advanced reconnaissance systems for the Polish Air Force, expanding its role in military intelligence and surveillance. These contract wins arrive shortly after RTX reported strong earnings and keep the focus on its core defense...
